text: Nau gaujenaasaunee naa hesā, hedaunau Ābraham,13.16 “Ābraham” is spelt thus once in this verse and spelt “Abraham” thirteen times elsewhere in the text. It is not known whether the spelling differences have any grammatical significance. henee Haujau heduguthaune, naune, nuu nasaudauchunee jajene, hāaugunade hehethee nuu deduguhude vadanesee?
